art.post: I just read “Heaven is for Real” and was deeply moved. I copied the picture of Jesus and have it on my desk ! I plan to send the book to my son and family who are also catholic but never or seldom go to church. I hope the parents and the 2 daughters will read it.(they all a ferocious readers).
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
